S10dbsu1-4u:30_0: 8. punar aparaṃ tathāgato 'nekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati tadyathaikām api
S10dbsu1-4u:30_1: jātiṃ dve tisraś catasraḥ paṃca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau navo daśa viṃśat triṃśac catvāriṃśat
S10dbsu1-4u:30_2: pañcāśaj jātiśataṃ jātisahasraṃ jātiśatasahasram anekāny api jātiśatāny anekāny api
S10dbsu1-4u:30_3: jātisahasrāṇy anekāny api jātiśatasahasrāṇi saṃvartakalpam api vivartakalpam api
S10dbsu1-4u:30_4: saṃvartavivartakalpam apy anekān api saṃvartakalpān anekān api vivartakalpān anekān
S10dbsu1-4u:30_5: api saṃvartavivartakalpān samanusmaraty amī nāma te bhavantaḥ satvā yatrāham āsam
S10dbsu1-4u:30_6: evaṃnāmaivaṃjātya evaṃgotra evamāhara evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedy evaṃdīrghāyur evaṃcirasthitika
S10dbsu1-4u:30_7: evamāyuḥparyantaḥ so 'haṃ tasmāc cyuto 'mutropapannas tasmāc cyuto 'mutropapannas
S10dbsu1-4u:31: iti sākāraṃ sanidānaṃ soddeśam anekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati /
S10dbsu1-4u:32_0: yat tathāgato 'nekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati tadyathaikām api jātiṃ dve tisraś
S10dbsu1-4u:32_1: catasraḥ paṃca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau navo daśa viṃśat triṃśac catvāriṃśat pañcāśaj jātiśataṃ
S10dbsu1-4u:32_2: jātisahasraṃ jātiśatasahasram anekāny api jātiśatāny api jātisahasrāṇy anekāny api
S10dbsu1-4u:32_3: jātiśatasahasrāṇi saṃvartakalpam api vivartakalpam api saṃvartavivartakalpam apy
S10dbsu1-4u:32_4: anekān api saṃvartakalpān anekān api vivartakalpān anekān api saṃvartavivartakalpān
S10dbsu1-4u:32_5: samanusmaraty amī nāma te bhavantaḥ satvā yatrāham āsam evaṃnāmaivaṃjātya evaṃgotra
S10dbsu1-4u:32_7: so 'haṃ tasmāc cyuto 'mutropapannas tasmād api cyuta ihopapannaḥ /
S10dbsu1-4u:33: iti sākāraṃ sanidānaṃ soddeśam anekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati /
S10dbsu1-4u:34: idam aṣṭamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāti brāhmaṃ cakraṃ vartayati pariṣadi samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadati /
S10dbsu1-4u:36_0: 9. punar aparaṃ tathāgato divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa satvāṃ paśyati
S10dbsu1-4u:36_1: cyavamānān apy upapadyamānān api suvarṇān api durvarṇān api hīnān api praṇītān api
S10dbsu1-4u:36_2: sugatim api gacchato durgatim api yathākarmopagāṃ satvāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S10dbsu1-4u:37_0: itīme bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanoduścaritena samanvāgatā
S10dbsu1-4u:37_1: āryāṇām apavādakā mithyādṛṣṭayo mithyādṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ
S10dbsu1-4u:37_2: kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyante /
S10dbsu1-4u:38_0: ime vā punar bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāyasucaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanaḥsucaritena samanvāgatā
S10dbsu1-4u:38_2: tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante /

S10dbsu1-4u:44_2: uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhāvaṃ prajānāmi

S10dbsu1-4u:132: 15.5b yat tathāgataḥ parasatvānāṃ nānādhimuktitāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti idaṃ pañcamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ pūrvavat*
S10dbsu1-4u:133: DbSū(3) 15.6a punar aparaṃ tathāgato nānādhātukaṃ lokam anekadhātukaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S10dbsu1-4u:135: 15.6b yat tathāgato nānādhātukaṃ lokam anekadhātukaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti idaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ pūrvavat*
S10dbsu1-4u:136: DbSū(3) 15.7a punar aparaṃ tathāgataḥ sarvatragāminīṃ pratipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
S10dbsu1-4u:138: 15.7b yat tathāgataḥ sarvatragāminīṃ pratipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti idaṃ saptamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ pūrvavat*
S10dbsu1-4u:140_0: 15.8a punar aparaṃ tathāgata anekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati tadyathā ekām
S10dbsu1-4u:140_1: api jātiṃ dve tisraś catasraḥ paṃca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau nava daśa viṃśat triṃśac catvāriṃśat
S10dbsu1-4u:140_2: pañcāśaj jātiśataṃ jātisahasraṃ jātiśatasahasram anekāny api jātiśatasahasrāṇi saṃvartakalpāṃ
S10dbsu1-4u:140_3: vivartakalpāṃ anekān api saṃvartavivartakalpāṃ samanusmarati amī nāma te satvā abhūvaṃ
S10dbsu1-4u:140_4: yatrāham āsam evaṃnāma evaṃjātya evaṃgotra evamāhāraḥ evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī
S10dbsu1-4u:140_5: evaṃdīrghāyur evaṃcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyantaḥ so 'haṃ tasmāc cyutaḥ amutropapannas
S10dbsu1-4u:140_6: tasmād api cyutaḥ amutropapannaḥ tasmād api cyutaḥ ihopapanna iti sākāraṃ sanidānaṃ
S10dbsu1-4u:142: 15.8b yat tathāgataḥ anekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati tadyathā ekām api jātiṃ dve tisraḥ pūrvavad idam aṣṭamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena pūrvavat*
S10dbsu1-4u:144_0: 15.9a punar aparaṃ tathāgato divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa satvāṃ paśyati
S10dbsu1-4u:144_1: cyavamānān apy upapadyamānān api suvarṇān api durvarṇān api hīnān api praṇītān api
S10dbsu1-4u:144_2: sugatim api gacchato durgatim api yathākarmopagāṃ satvāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti itīme
S10dbsu1-4u:144_3: bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanoduścaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām
S10dbsu1-4u:144_5: kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyaṃte /
S10dbsu1-4u:145_0: ime vā punar bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāyasucaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanaḥsucaritena samanvāgatā
S10dbsu1-4u:145_2: tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante /
S10dbsu1-4u:147: 15.9b yat tathāgato divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa satvāṃ paśyati pūrvavat* idaṃ navamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena pūrvavat*
S10dbsu1-4u:149_0: 15.10a punar aparaṃ tathāgataḥ āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ
S10dbsu1-4u:149_1: dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣīkṛtvopasaṃpadya pravedayati kṣīṇā me jātir
S10dbsu1-4u:149_2: uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmi /
S10dbsu1-4u:151: 15.10b yat tathāgata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāt pūrvavat* idaṃ daśamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena pūrvavat*
S10dbsu1-4u:153: DbSū(3) 17 idam avocad bhagavān āptamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavadbhāṣitam abhyanandam* //
S10dbsu1-4u:156: Dasabalasutra: DbSū(4) = Chinese Samyuktāgama sūtra 703 (T 99, II 189a20-b9)
S10dbsu1-4u:157: Based on the edition by Jin-il Chung: "Ein drittes und ein viertes Daśabala-Sūtra",
S10dbsu1-4u:158: Sanko Bunka Kenkyūjo Nenpo (Annual of the Sanko Research Institute for the Studies of Buddhism)
S10dbsu1-4u:172_0: 5.8b evaṃcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyantaḥ so 'haṃ tasmāc cyutaḥ amutropapannaḥ tasmāc
S10dbsu1-4u:172_1: cyutaḥ amutropapannaḥ tasmā cyutaḥ ihopapannaḥ iti sākāraṃ sanidānaṃ soddeśam anekavidhaṃ
S10dbsu1-4u:173_0: idam aṣṭamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha
S10dbsu1-4u:173_1: udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāti brāhmaṃ cakraṃ vartayati pariṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ nadati /
S10dbsu1-4u:175_0: 5.9a punar aparaṃ tathāgato divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa satvāṃ paśyati
S10dbsu1-4u:175_1: cyavamānān apyupapadyamānān api suvarṇān api durvarṇān api hīnān api praṇītān api
S10dbsu1-4u:175_2: sugatim api gacchato durgatim api yathākarmopagāṃ satvāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S10dbsu1-4u:176_0: itīme bhavaṃtaḥ satvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanoduścaritena samanvāgatā
S10dbsu1-4u:176_1: āryāṇām apavādakā mithyādṛṣṭayo mithyādṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ
S10dbsu1-4u:176_2: kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyaṃte /
S10dbsu1-4u:177_0: ime vā punar bhavaṃtaḥ satvāḥ kāyasucaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanaḥsucaritena samanvāgatāḥ
S10dbsu1-4u:177_2: tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyaṃte /
S10dbsu1-4u:179_0: 5.9b yat tathāgato divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa satvāṃ paśyati cyavamānān
S10dbsu1-4u:179_1: apy upapadyamānān api suvarṇān api durvarṇān api hīnān api praṇītān api sugatim api
S10dbsu1-4u:179_2: gacchato durgatim api yathākarmopagāṃ satvāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S10dbsu1-4u:180_0: itīme bhavaṃtaḥ satvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanoduścaritena samanvāgatā
S10dbsu1-4u:180_1: āryāṇām apavādakā mithyādṛṣṭayo mithyādṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ
S10dbsu1-4u:180_2: kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyaṃte /
S10dbsu1-4u:181_0: ime vā punar bhavaṃtaḥ satvāḥ kāyasucaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanaḥsucaritena samanvāgatā
S10dbsu1-4u:182_0: idaṃ navamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha
S10dbsu1-4u:182_1: udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāti brāhmaṃ cakraṃ vartayati pariṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ nadati /
S10dbsu1-4u:184_0: 5.10a punar aparaṃ tathāgataḥ āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ
S10dbsu1-4u:184_1: dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣīkṛtvopasaṃpadya pravedayati kṣīṇā me jātir
S10dbsu1-4u:184_2: uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmi /
S10dbsu1-4u:186_0: 5.10b yat tathāgataḥ āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa
S10dbsu1-4u:186_1: eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣīkṛtvopasaṃpadya pravedayati kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ
S10dbsu1-4u:186_2: brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmi /
S10dbsu1-4u:187_0: idaṃ daśamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha
S10dbsu1-4u:187_1: udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāti brāhmaṃ cakraṃ vartayati pariṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ nadati /
S10dbsu1-4u:189_0: 6.1 taṃ cainaṃ tathāgataṃ sthānāsthānajñānabale praśnaṃ pṛccheyuḥ yathā tat tathāgatena
S10dbsu1-4u:189_1: sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ jñātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ viditaṃ vijñātaṃ samyag evābhisaṃbuddhaṃ tathā
S10dbsu1-4u:191_0: 6.2 taṃ cainaṃ tathāgataṃ karmasvakajñānabale praśnaṃ pṛccheyuḥ yathā tat tathāgatena
S10dbsu1-4u:191_1: karmasvakajñānabalaṃ jñātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ viditaṃ vijñātaṃ samyag evābhisaṃbuddhaṃ tathā
S10dbsu1-4u:193_0: 6.3 taṃ cainaṃ tathāgataṃ dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabale praśnaṃ pṛccheyuḥ
S10dbsu1-4u:193_1: yathā tat tathāgatena dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalaṃ jñātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ viditaṃ
S10dbsu1-4u:193_2: vijñātaṃ samyag evābhisaṃbuddhaṃ tathā tat tathāgataḥ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāt*
S10dbsu1-4u:195_0: 6.4 taṃ cainaṃ tathāgataṃ parasatvānām indriyaparāvaratāṃ jñānabale praśnaṃ pṛccheyuḥ
S10dbsu1-4u:195_1: yathā tat tathāgatena parasatvānām indriyaparāvaratāṃ jñānabalaṃ jñātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ viditaṃ
S10dbsu1-4u:195_2: vijñātaṃ samyag evābhisaṃbuddhaṃ tathā tat tathāgataḥ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāt*
S10dbsu1-4u:197_0: 6.5 taṃ cainaṃ tathāgataṃ parasatvānāṃ nānādhimuktijñānabale praśnaṃ pṛccheyuḥ yathā
S10dbsu1-4u:197_1: tat tathāgatena parasatvānāṃ nānādhimuktijñānabalaṃ jñātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ viditaṃ vijñātaṃ
S10dbsu1-4u:197_2: samyag evābhisaṃbuddhaṃ tathā tat tathāgataḥ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāt*
S10dbsu1-4u:199_0: 6.6 taṃ cainaṃ tathāgataṃ nānādhātujñānabale praśnaṃ pṛccheyuḥ yathā tat tathāgatena
S10dbsu1-4u:199_1: nānādhātujñānabalaṃ jñātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ viditaṃ vijñātaṃ samyag evābhisaṃbuddhaṃ tathā
S10dbsu1-4u:201_0: 6.7 taṃ cainaṃ tathāgataṃ sarvatragāminīpratipajjñānabale praśnaṃ pṛccheyuḥ yathā
S10dbsu1-4u:201_1: tat tathāgatena sarvatragāminīpratipajjñānabalaṃ jñātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ viditaṃ vijñātaṃ samyag
S10dbsu1-4u:201_2: evābhisaṃbuddhaṃ tathā tat tathāgataḥ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāt*
S10dbsu1-4u:203_0: 6.8 taṃ cainaṃ tathāgataṃ pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānabale praśnaṃ pṛccheyuḥ yathā tat
S10dbsu1-4u:203_1: tathāgatena pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānabalaṃ jñātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ viditaṃ vijñātaṃ samyag evābhisaṃbuddhaṃ
S10dbsu1-4u:203_2: tathā tat tathāgataḥ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāt*
S10dbsu1-4u:205_0: 6.9 taṃ cainaṃ tathāgataṃ cyutyupapādajñānabale praśnaṃ pṛccheyuḥ yathā tat tathāgatena
S10dbsu1-4u:205_1: cyutyupapādajñānabalaṃ jñātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ viditaṃ vijñātaṃ samyag evābhisaṃbuddhaṃ tathā
S10dbsu1-4u:207_0: 6.10 taṃ cainaṃ tathāgataṃ āsravakṣayajñānabale praśnaṃ pṛccheyuḥ yathā tat tathāgatenāsravakṣayajñānabalaṃ
S10dbsu1-4u:207_1: jñātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ viditaṃ vijñātaṃ samyag evābhisaṃbuddhaṃ tathā tat tathāgataḥ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāt*
S10dbsu1-4u:208: DbSū(4) 7.1 sthānāsthānajñānabalam iti bhikṣavaḥ samāhitasya vadāmi nāsamāhitasya /
S10dbsu1-4u:209: DbSū(4) 7.2 karmasvakajñānabalam iti bhikṣavaḥ samāhitasya vadāmi nāsamāhitasya /
S10dbsu1-4u:210: DbSū(4) 7.3 dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalam iti bhikṣavaḥ samāhitasya vadāmi nāsamāhitasya /
S10dbsu1-4u:212: 7.4 parasatvānām indriyaparāvaratāṃ jñānabalam iti bhikṣavaḥ samāhitasya vadāmi nāsamāhitasya /
S10dbsu1-4u:213: DbSū(4) 7.5 parasatvānāṃ nānādhimuktitāṃ jñānabalam iti bhikṣavaḥ samāhitasya vadāmi nāsamāhitasya /
S10dbsu1-4u:214: DbSū(4) 7.6 nānādhātujñānabalam iti bhikṣavaḥ samāhitasya vadāmi nāsamāhitasya /
S10dbsu1-4u:215: DbSū(4) 7.7 sarvatragāminīpratipajjñānabalam iti bhikṣavaḥ samāhitasya vadāmi nāsamāhitasya /
S10dbsu1-4u:216: DbSū(4) 7.8 pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānabalam iti bhikṣavaḥ samāhitasya vadāmi nāsamāhitasya /
